data.title: Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker's Relationship Timeline
data.meta_description: Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker have had a very passionate and public relationship and were engaged after less than a year of dating in October 2021. Here, their history.
data.text:
Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker have had a very passionate and public relationship and were engaged after less than a year of dating in October 2021. They shared photos from the beach proposal in Montecito, California.

They ended up having quite a few weddings ceremonies, one in las Vegas, one in a Santa Barbara clerk's office to make things legal, and one in Italy. This might all seem fast, but they have actually been friends and neighbors for quite some time. They both have homes in Calabasas but have been in other relationships.

Kardashian has three children with her ex, Scott Disick: Mason, Penelope, and Reign. Barker has two children: Landon and Alabama, with his ex-wife Shanna Moakler, and is the step-dad to Moakler's daughter, Atiana Cecilia De La Hoya.

In June, Kardashian and Barker announced they were expecting their first child together.

Here's Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barkerâ€™s complete relationship timeline.

January 2021

The couple was seen together in Palm Springs at Kris Jennerâ€™s home there, sparking rumors they might be dating. People reported in late January that it was official, with a source saying, â€œTheyâ€™re in Palm Springs together. Theyâ€™ve been dating for about a month or two.â€ The source added, â€œTravis has liked her for a while.â€

February 2021

E! reported they went to dinner at Matsuhisa in Los Angeles, and an eyewitness told the publication that â€œthey seem very connected, very close. Travis took her hand, and they giggled as they started having a little thumb war with one another. It was playful and sweet. They were talking constantly and very engaged with one another. It seems like such a natural fit.â€

They spent that Valentine's Day together, according to Page Six. Barker went semi-Instagram official by sharing a photo of a diamond anklet that he gave her on his Instagram Story. Kardashian shared an ode to her new boyfriend on her Instagram Story: â€œRoses are red / Violets are blue / Garlic bread / Blink-182,â€ the poem read.

She later went official-official with a picture of her hand and Barker's entwined. Barker commented â€œğŸ–¤â€ on the post. A source told People at the time,â€œKourtney is very happy with Travis. She wanted to confirm their relationship, because it's something positive.â€

March 2021

In early March, Barker made an appearance on The Drew Barrymore Show. Barrymore asked Barker about dating with kids, and he took the opportunity to praise Kardashian.

â€œUp until now, I would date girls who didn't have kids, and I find it kind of hard because I think they would have trouble understanding, like, â€˜Why don't you want to go to dinner every night with me? Or why don't you want to see me every night?â€™,â€ Barker said. â€œAnd now, I'm spending time with a woman who's a great mom, who's a great friend, and you don't have to worry about any of those things. It just comes natural.â€

Later in March, they were photographed at UFC 260: Miocic vs. Ngannou 2 fight, alongside friends Megan Fox and Machine Gun Kelly.

April 2021

They took their first family vacation in April, heading to Deer Valley, Utah. Kardashian shared pics featuring Alabama and Atiana on snowmobiles.

Kardashian called Barker her boyfriend for the first time in a TikTok posted by Barker's daughter, Alabama, while playing the viral â€œPass the Phoneâ€ challenge.

â€œI'm passing the phone to my boyfriend,â€ she said.

Barker also shared content from the vacation, including some videos from the slopes.

They spent that Easter together as well, and Kris Jenner shared pics of the family gathering on Instagram.

â€œHappy Easter, and thank you @callawaygolf #irvingazoff for making our Easter so special!!! ğŸ™ğŸ°ğŸ£ğŸ¥ğŸ™ and thank you for the @coreygamble @realtristan13 @travisscott @travisbarker that are already on the golf course!!!!!!! LOL #impatient,â€ Jenner captioned the post.

That month, a source told Entertainment Tonight that things had become â€œway more serious.â€

â€œThis is the happiest Kourtney has been in a while, and her family is thrilled for her,â€ the source said. â€œKourtney and Travis' kids get along great, and all have the best time together. Kourtney's been trying to keep their relationship as private as she can on social media, but they're both super into each other and cute together.â€

Then Barker got a tattoo reading â€œKourtneyâ€ on his chest.

For the reality TV star's 42nd birthday, Barker gave her a huge bouquet.

And on Instagram, he wrote, â€œI F-CKING LOVE YOU! ğŸ–¤ YOU'RE A BLESSING TO THIS WORLD HAPPY BIRTHDAY.â€

They headed back to Utah later that month.

May 2021

For Mother's Day, Barker gave Kardashian more flowers.

And he got another tattoo of the words â€œI love you,â€ in her handwriting.

August 2021

Kardashian helped Barker take his first flight since 2008 after surviving a crash 13 years prior. He captioned his post about the flight to Mexico, â€œWith you anything is possible.â€

They headed to Italy to celebrate.

Shortly after, Kardashian's ex Scott Disick sent an Instagram DM to one of The Kardashian star's ex-boyfriends, Younes Bendjima, saying, â€œYo is this chick ok!???? Broooo like what is this. In the middle of Italy.â€

Disick appeared to be jealous of her affection with with her new beau.

September 2021

The couple went red carpet official at the 2021 MTV VMAs.

October 2021

On October 17, 2021, Barker proposed to Kardashian on the beach in Montecito, California.

December 2021

Kardashian and Barker spent the holidays with their family, and she shared some pics with the caption, â€œâ€˜Twas the night before Christmas.â€

April 2022

The couple enjoyed a â€œpracticeâ€ wedding in Las Vegas after the Grammys, and she shared photos of her and Barker at a chapel, explaining they were not actually married.

â€œFound these in my camera roll,â€ Kardashian wrote. â€œOnce upon a time in a land far, far away (Las Vegas) at 2am, after an epic night and a little tequila, a queen and her handsome king ventured out to the only open chapel with an Elvis and got married (with no license). Practice makes perfect.â€

February 2022

Talk of having kids is on the table. A source speaking to Entertainment Tonight said that the couple is â€œso in love,â€ and they are â€œopen to the idea of having children together and growing their family.â€

It was added that â€œtheir families are both supportive of it too and just want them to be happy.â€

May 2022

They had another wedding ceremony in May, but this one was legally binding. TMZ broke the news that they were married on Sunday, May 15, in Santa Barbara. They left the scene of the courthouse in a convertible with a â€œJust Marriedâ€ sign attached to its trunk.

People confirmed the news, with a source saying, â€œThey had to legally get married first ahead of their big Italian wedding, which is happening very soon. All the details are set and the whole family, including all the kids, are very excited.â€

The big ceremony took place in Portofino, Italy, and the event eventually became a special aired on Hulu.

June 2022

In June, Barker had a scary and painful health complication and had to be hospitalized for pancreatitis. TMZ wrote he was checked into West Hills hospital, then transferred by ambulance to Cedars-Sinai Medical Center.

Later, Barker wrote on Instagram Stories, â€œI went in for an endoscopy Monday feeling great. But After dinner, I developed excruciating pain and have been hospitalized ever since.â€

He continued, â€œDuring the endoscopy, I had a very small polyp removed right in a very sensitive area, usually handled by specialists, which unfortunately damaged a critical pancreatic drainage tube. This resulted in severe life threatening pancreatitis.â€

Barker concluded, â€œI am so very very grateful that with intensive treatment I am currently much better.â€

On Stories, Kardashian wrote, â€œOh what a scary and emotional week it has been. Our health is everything and sometimes we take for granted how quickly it can change. Travis and I went in for a routine endoscopy together and he ended up with severe, life-threatening pancreatitis.â€

She added, â€œI am so grateful to God for healing my husband, for all of your prayers for him and for us, for the overwhelming outpouring of love and support. I am so touched and appreciative.â€

She then thanked doctors and nurses at Cedars Sinai for their â€œwonderful careâ€ of them both, writing, â€œIt's crazy how sometimes words could never truly express the gratitude or feelings I have inside me.â€

August 2022

Kardashian joined Travis Barker as he went on tour with Machine Gun Kelly, and shared some pictures of what it looks like being a â€œtour wife.â€

Barker commented on the post, â€œTour life's better with you,â€ with a black heart and devil face emoji for a little emphasis. He later shared some pics of her too.

â€œPractice makes perfect,â€ he captioned it.

Which she re-shared, writing, â€œTime for drum practice.â€

â€œFavorite time of the day,â€ Barker commented.

September 2022

In September, Kardashian told WSJ magazine that she and Barker had decided to pause their fertility treatments when they were planning their wedding.

â€œWe started an IVF journey, but I stopped. It was a lot,â€ she said. â€œI took a break to just focus on our wedding and getting married.â€

April 2023

Kardashian attended Barker's Coachella set with Blink-182 and original bandmate Tom DeLonge.

â€œMy first @blink182 show!â€ Kardashian wrote on a post about the night.

Barker then commented, â€œYour coming on tour with me.â€

May 2023

In May, Kardashian shared on the first episode of The Kardashians' third season more about ending IVF.

â€œWe are officially done with IVF,â€ she said in a confessional. â€œWe would love a baby more than anything, but I just really believe in what God has in store for us. If thatâ€™s a baby, then I believe that it will happen.â€

She said added that her seven frozen eggs from before she started dating Barker â€œdidnâ€™t survive, [and none of them] made it to an embryo.â€

â€œThe freezing of the eggs isnâ€™t guaranteed,â€ she said. â€œI think that thatâ€™s a misunderstanding. People do it thinking that itâ€™s like a safety net and itâ€™s not.â€

She added, â€œWhateverâ€™s meant to be... Being happy is most important, and being a good parent to my kids.â€

June 2023

In June, Kardashian and Barker announced they were expecting a baby by having the POOSH founder hold up a sign reading, â€œTravis, I'm pregnantâ€ at a Blink-182 concert.

Just one week later, they shared the babyâ€™s sex with a shot of blue confetti: They are having a boy.

A source told Entertainment Tonight in June, â€œKourtney and Travis are on cloud nine. This pregnancy is beyond Kourtney's wildest dreams. Kourtney and Travis feel like this is one of the most magical things to happen to them and a complete miracle. They are so thrilled and can't wait to experience this pregnancy together, bring a baby into the world as a unit, and expand and grow their families."

July 2023

Kardashian shared some very sexy maternity looks with the caption â€œlost and found.â€

September 2023

In September, Barker returned from his Blink-182 tour to join Kardashian at a hospital in Los Angeles, California. The couple were photographed leaving together, but there has been no announcement as to what the issue was. However, the band tweeted about changing tour plans in light of Barker's exodus.

â€œDue to an urgent family matter, Travis has had to return home to the States,â€ the band wrote. â€œThe Glasgow, Belfast, and Dublin shows are being postponed. More information in regards to his return to Europe and rescheduled dates will be provided as soon as available.â€

Barker did share images of himself in an airport prayer room as he waited to travel to the U.S. from the U.K.

His ex, Shanna Moakler did comment to TMZ that the children she shares with Barker are â€œsafe and sound.â€

â€œWhen they have to cancel shows, it's a big deal, so I am praying for his immediate family and the baby and Kourtney is safe and okay,â€ she added.

At the end of September, Barker and Kardashian celebrate their sonâ€™s upcoming arrival with a Disney-themed baby shower.

Fans speculated that Barker may have hinted that they plan to name their baby Rocky, as he liked a post on X, formerly known as Twitter, calling the name out as cute.

On Saturday, September 30, Kardashian shared a photo in her Instagram Story of a gorgeous rose bouquet sent to her by Barker after he returned to his tour with Blink-182. According to his Stories, Barker had touched down in Lisbon, Portugal.

October 2023

On October 1, Kourtney shared some shots of one of her Halloween costumes as the â€œBride of Frankenstein.â€

In her Stories, she reposted a Reel from when she and Barker dressed up as the Bride and Frankenstein's Monster.

Kourtney appeared on the cover of Vanity Fair Italia, and during the interview she discussed recovering from fetal surgery and moving beyond the experience.

â€œRight after the surgery, I reached the point where I let myself go and I stopped worrying,â€ she said. â€œNow I talk to the baby every day, have a positive mindset, keep my head straight, and say a lot of prayers...It took me a while to let go of the fear.â€

November 2023

Kardashian welcomed her first son with Barker in Los Angeles on November 1. His birth certificate was obtained by The Blast on November 16. The couple named him Rocky Thirteen Barker.

On an episode of The Kardashians, a few weeks later, Kardashian shared more about how the baby came to be, including that she conceived a year after giving up on IVF treatments. She says she had even given up on tracking her ovulation, but she still new when the baby was conceived.

â€œIt happened on Valentine's Day,â€ Kourtney announced.

In a confessional, a produce asked her to clarify, saying, â€œYou know when it happened?â€

Kourtney answered, â€œYeah, of course. I mean, people would always say to us, â€˜The second you stop trying it's just gonna happen.â€™ We stopped doing IVF maybe two months before our wedding, so it took a year, I think, for all of those hormones and chemicals to get out of my system.â€

She went on, â€œWe were not trying whatsoever. I didn't even check my ovulation anymore. We decided to put it in God's hands. I thought it was just not happening, and we were, like, accepting of it, and then, God's plan.â€

The show went on to explain that Kourtney knew of her pregnancy all season and offered some flashbacks from previous moments alluding to a possible pregnancy.

â€œI mean, it truly feels like a miracle, being able to be pregnant and have a baby with the love of my life,â€ Kourtney concluded.

December 2023

Since the birth of Rocky Thirteen, a source says these two parents have only gotten closer.

â€œKourtney and Travis are over the moon and could not be more elated that they share a child of their own together,â€ the insider told Entertainment Tonight. â€œKourtney and Travis already had an unbreakable bond, but having a baby together has brought them even closer and made them fall even more in love. This experience has solidified their feelings that they were destined to be together.â€

They went on, â€œTravis loves to shower Kourtney with gifts, but is also there for her on a deep level. He is an incredibly dedicated father and partner. Theyâ€™re so excited to experience this new chapter together and unite their families even more.â€

The baby has been in good health and the couple's previous kids have only gotten closer, too.

â€œItâ€™s been so much fun for all of them to have a baby brother around and something new that they can all share together,â€ said the source. â€œEach of them have a special bond with Rocky in their own unique ways. Kourtney's family is also always coming over and her sisters and Kris are all very hands-on and helpful.â€

Things have also been going well with Scott Disick and his co-parenting with Kardashian.

â€œScott is doing his best to keep things balanced in terms of co-parenting and making sure to be present and communicative,â€ the source said. â€œHeâ€™s continuing to fulfill all his responsibilities and be a great father to his kids.â€

January 2024

Kardashian and Barker made a surprise appearance together at the Emmys on January 15. They kissed on the red carpet:

Kardashian shared a photo of herself holding baby Rocky on January 28.

On January 31, a source alleged to the Daily Mail that Kardashian and Barker were exploring expanding their family further and having a second child together through a surrogate. Kardashianâ€™s pregnancy with Rocky â€œwas touch and go for a moment, but everyone is healthy and happy, and it has made them want even more children together,â€ the source claimed. â€œThis pregnancy challenged their love for each other in such a way that it is even better than it wasâ€”it makes people vomit with all the lovey-dovey high school related PDA they share.â€

â€œSince Rocky is so young and they are enjoying him, next year would be the soonest time to start thinking about more kids,â€ they continued. â€œThey have talked about trying for another child, but this time around they would likely go through a surrogate. It is a consistent conversation between them that hasn't changed to a â€˜no.â€™â€

February 2024

On February 6, Kardashian and Barker arrived in Sydney, Australia with 3-month-old Rocky. Some paparazzi photos show Kardashian carrying their newborn son, covering him up with a blanket while Barker held an umbrella, shielding them all from the rain. Their trip Down Under comes ahead of Barkerâ€™s Blink-182 Australian tour, which kicks off on February 8 and ends February 17. Kardashianâ€™s children, Penelope, 11, and Reign, 9, also tagged along for the trip, but 13-year-old Mason did not appear to join them.

On Sunday, February 18, the couple were photographed enjoying a little PDA in Brisbane. The couple were wearing matching black ensembles as they walked together, Kardashian in a hoodie and sweatpants and Barker wearing a Balenciaga sweatshirt and a black baseball cap. The couple stop to embrace and exchange heated looks in the street.

March 2024

Barker shared a photo dump on March 3 documenting Blink-182â€™s tours in Australia and New Zealand. He included a photo with Kardashian, as well as an adorable sneak peak at their son, Rocky.

Barker opened up the carousel with a picture of the babyâ€™s foot resting on his drum practice pad. The fifth photo shows him and Kardashian standing behind a cardboard cutout of a man in a tux and a woman holding a bouquet of pink flowers.

â€œTour was over, weâ€™d survived,â€ Barker wrote in the caption.

April 2024

To celebrate Kardashianâ€™s 45th birthday, Barker shared a carousel of pictures from their lives together, including some rare shots of baby Rocky. In one photo, the Poosh founder is on the bed, looking at her baby who is stretched out beside her. In another pic, Barker is carrying his son while kissing his wife in front of a plane, and the babyâ€™s feet are on view.

â€œHappy Birthday to my beautiful wife, soulmate and best friend forever,â€ he captioned the images. â€œI love you, I love our life together. Thank you for being the most amazing wife a person could ask for. Here's to many more years of adventures together.â€

May 2024

Kardashian and Barker celebrated the second anniversary of their Italian wedding ceremony on May 22. Kardashian marked the occasion on Instagram by sharing more photos from the event.

â€œ2 years ago I married the husband of my dreams ğŸ–¤ forever with you,â€ Kardashian captioned the post.

Barker left a comment on it, writing to Kardashian, â€œMy dream wife, forever with you ğŸ¤µğŸ»ğŸ‘°ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸.â€

July 2024

On Wednesday, July 3, the couple left Barkerâ€™s Blink-182 concert in Las Vegas walking hand-in-hand, stopping to enjoy some affection together. Barker went shirtless in jeans and a beanie while Kardashian wore a fluffy white coat.

A few days later, the pair were seen together at Barkerâ€™s 5K â€œRun Travis Runâ€ in support of Boys and Girls Club Los Angeles. The couple took several minutes to kiss and hug before and after the run, enjoying some PDA and exercise. They were both wearing black athletic wear, sunglasses, and baseball caps.
